Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey and red in section with a number of small white inclusions, the interior bears faint traces of a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of seven lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393791) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393791)
